properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing-River bank

Vegetative cover improving along the river banks Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m gri

properties.Observatio: Existing Earthen canal,  some places Constructed of rectangular concrete lining450mm x 450mm)   Water from this canal is used to grow paddy on an area of about 80 acres.
properties.Descript_1:
Construction of concrete canal

Site preparation & setting out

Earth excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus materials up to 30m by Manually.

Plywood form work including making, fixing & removing for concrete canals at ground
